result.name: CloudOS App Onboarding
result.description:
Service Description:

Submit this form for Onboarding of applications to CloudOS v2.

What will happen after you have submitted your Request?

The application will be registered in the business service map, access controls will be generated, and CloudOS configuration applied automatically in the Development environment. 

  1. User will be notified that the on-boarding process will begin
  2. AD groups will be created for the specified Moniker.
    1. Application Admins will be added to the appropriate group
  3. Access to supporting services will given to AD groups.
  4. CloudOS will be provisioned via automation
  5. Vault Paths and Mounts will be provisioned via automation
  6. User will be notified upon process completion with instructions.

 

Who will fulfill my Request?

  • Automated 

What approvals are required?

  • The service owner must approve the request to on-board apps to CloudOS.

  • Security and and Cloud Infrastructure approve pull-request during Vault policy creation.

Questions? Comments?

  • Please reach out to cloudos-engg@autodesk.com for CloudOS questions or cloud.ops.portfolio.process.business.tools@autodesk.com for form questions.

result.name: New Application Router Record
result.description:
Service Description:

A router record is a record that is used to correlate a Service Tag to a Business Service.  Use this form to request to create a new record in the Application Router Table.

 

What will happen after you have submitted your Request? 

Your record will be created.

 

Who will fulfill my Request?

  • Cloud Ops PPBT

 

What approvals are required?

  • None

 

Questions? Comments?

  • Please reach out to cloud.ops.portfolio.process.business.tools@autodesk.com or use the comments field at the bottom of the form

result.name: Security Exception
result.description:
Service Description:

Use this form to make a request for a security exception.

 

What will happen after you have submitted your Request?

Your requested exception will be reviewed, and you will be notified of the outcome via email.

 

Who will fulfill my Request?

  • Cloud Security

 

What approvals are required?

  • Hiring Manager
  • Cloud Security

 

Questions? Comments?

  • Please reach out to cloud.ops.portfolio.process.business.tools@autodesk.com or use the comments field at the bottom of the form

result.name: Request a new AWS Account
result.description:
What happens after you submit your new AWS account request?

  1. Accounts will be activated once security credentials are issued.
  2. Account requestors will have 2 business days to submit a forecast for user adoption (in Production environments) or average compute hours (in Development environments).
  3. We recommend to have: one Production account per service, one Development per service and one for Staging per service.
  4. Questions to consider before submitting a new account request:
    • Is this an account for a brand new service?
      • If yes, provide new service name, description and email confirmation from Product Management leader.
      • If not, explore using existing services accounts and enable tagging to track the new activity. Justification must be provided to request a new account for an existing service.
    • Plan in advance for speed:
      • Calculate the monthly adoption (for Production) OR compute hours (for Development) average forecasts.
      • Seek your Finance Business Partner's budget approval to cover the new account costs.

Please contact AWS.Account.Request@autodesk.com with any questions.
